title: A Conversation with Being: Poems as Prayers and Prayers and Poems
description: New guest Christina Hendricksen and regular Grail Knight Shari Suter and I discuss the connection between poetry and prayer, the recovery of the Adamic language, the repair of the world, and conversations with the ground of Being.
